Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute at  75th/King Drive to Champlain
ShortDescription: 75 74th/75th buses rerouted via 75th, King Dr, 76th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to street blockage nr 75th/King Dr to Champlain

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to street blockage near 75th/King Drive to Champlain.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Northbound #54 Cicero Reroute near Cicero/Diversey
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted near Cicero/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Diversey, Pulaski, Belmont, Cicero, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Cicero/Diversey.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
